channel.title: Faq on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Faq on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Frequendly Asked Questions
item.description: Do I have access to all the hotels in the test environment? No, we use a test supplier, so there is a limited number of hotels in the data base to be used. Which are the languages allowed in HotelX? The new aggregator allows each language, it will depend from each supplier. How many hotels code are allowed to request at the same time? We recommend a maximum of 200 hotels, the new aggregator will split to each supplier the maximum hotels allowed in different batches in order to request to the supplier all the hotels.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: What is TravelgateX? TravelgateX platform provides a single API endpoint for all of our API products. This makes it easy for you to integrate our full travel catalog and services into your applications (regardless of whether you are integrating to a website, mobile app, widget, or other interface). Instead of having to deal with REST APIs, you’ll be able to use full poser of GraphQL to interact with your data.
